amendment.description: To encourage States to give priority to pedestrian and bicycle facility enhancement projects that include a coordinated physical activity or healthy lifestyles program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2333 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2333 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1237-1238; text: CR S1237) To encourage States to give priority to pedestrian and bicycle facility enhancement projects that include a coordinated physical activity or healthy lifestyles program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2333 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2333 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 2285.
